operations.command: echo "Document Year Citation Analysis:" && echo "" && for year_range in "pre-2020" "2020-2023" "2024-2026"; do echo "=== $year_range ===" && case $year_range in "pre-2020") pattern="(198[0-9]|199[0-9]|200[0-9]|201[0-9])" ;; "2020-2023") pattern="(2020|2021|2022|2023)" ;; "2024-2026") pattern="(2024|2025|2026)" ;; esac && for doc in "MEGA_SYNTHESIS_2026.md" "meta-meta-systems-research.md" "trading_ml_research_final_2026.md" "market_regime_detection_sota_2025.md" "luxalgo_roi_swot_ranking.md"; do count=$(grep -oE "$pattern" "docs/research/$doc" 2>/dev/null | wc -l) && echo "$doc: $count mentions" done && echo "" done
